name: Unisex 3/4 Genuine Shearling Coat
description: ITEM: 9700Heat up winter with a sizzling combo of luxury, warmth and a relaxed attitude. Roll-up cuffs match the interior of the detachable hood, framing you nicely. name: Ladies Suede Skirt
description: Emit an air of cool sophistication when you wear this luxurious 24 inch  suede skirt, a perfect piece for trendy daywear.  The style is fitted and form-flattering with a sassy kick slit in the back and elastic at the side for premium comfort and additional freedom of movement.  Acetate/nylon lining.  Imported.  Leather clean. >;P>; Color: Hickory.>;P>;9203R Misses (4-10)

description: ITEM: 3600In search of value? Look no further than this nappa leather trench coat tailored extra-generously, trimmed with cape back, belted cuffs and shoulder epaulets. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Versatile Genuine Lambskin Leather Button Vest
description: ITEM: 4630What else can spice up a T-shirt, shirt, sweater or sweatshirt with equal style? All-leather and such a good value, you’ll want one in every color. For him or for her, each button-front vest is classically styled; his with a front yoke and plain back, hers with a plain front and adjustable back strap. Two front welt pockets, fully poly lined. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Leather jeans
description: ITEM: 5009Our soft lambskin leather pants are designed with “comfort fit” elastic inserts at the waist and shapely seaming. Jeans styling with frontpockets, belt loops, zip and button fly closure. Tailored with permanent leg creases for a long, lean look. Lined in acetate/nylon. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Reversable Full Length Leather Coat
description: ITEM: 7007You’ll find warmth and comfort from the cold in this gorgeous heavy duty full-length 50” coat. Made of soft-as- lambskin leather, it also reverses to a soft and fun faux fur. Leather side out, the plush acrylic fur adds delicious detailing atthe generous shawl collar, tuxedo front and at the cuffs. Two on-seam side slash outside pockets. Imported. Leather clean.

description: ITEM: 6300The softest fox fur is a necessary indulgence you simply can’t afford to pass up. Our 50” long, luxurious lambskin coat with detachable fur collar (optional) reveals a shawl collar underneath. Polysatin lining with poly filler. Imported. Leather clean.

description: ITEM: 6310The softest fox fur is a necessary indulgence you simply can’t afford to pass up. Our 50” long, luxurious lambskin coat with detachable fur collar (optional) reveals a shawl collar underneath. Polysatin lining with poly filler. Imported. Leather clean.

description: ITEM: 64003/4-length lambskin body. Zipper closure with wind flap and drawstring bottom and hood are weather beaters. Two patch pockets outside, two chest pockets inside. Polysatin lined, poly filled. Imported. Leather clean.

description: ITEM: 7194Lined leather pants with a modern edge. Pared to perfection with a flat front, elastic at the sides of waist and an extended tab with zip-fly, snap and inside button closure. Fully lined, poly filled. Imported.

name: Ladies Classic Lambskin Walking Coat
description: ITEM: 6108Our classic lambskin leather walking coat in a sleek and timeless cut will never fade from style—or wearability. Wear it comfortably all day; fashionably for multiple seasons. It features a three-button front, two outside slash pockets, and a leather trimmed pocket inside. With a full quilted polysatin lining with light poly fill. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Genuine Rabbit Hooded Jacket
description: ITEM: 5501Toasty and soft, yet handsome enough to be masculine for him, and luxurious enough to be feminine for her. Imagine being completely enveloped in the fluffy luxury of genuine rabbit fur! Our jackets guarantee warmth with style, featuring a cozy hood, leather-trimmed front zipper, two outside pockets, and elastic wrists to keep out the cold. Lined in polysatin with polyfill. Imported. Fur clean.

name: Ladies B3 Leather Bomber
description: ITEM: 1355Keep warm at any altitude in our authentic replica of the jacket that kept brave bomber crews warm during their missions over the skies of Europe. Crafted of rugged nappa leather with a full acrylic pile sherpa lining. Trimmed in contrasting colors, unique collar with tab closure. Adjustable fold up cuffs for a custom fit. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Stylish Leather Parka
description: ITEM: 7002A beautiful zip-up nappa leather 3/4 length parka features a zip-off detachable hood, snap close storm flap, 2 lower outside pockets, 1 inside pocket, and adjustable roll cuffs. Zip-out quilted liner with warm poly fill. Imported. Leatherclean.

name: Ladies Wool Double Breasted Coat
description: ITEM: 8016The classic styling of this gorgeous double breasted coat reflects an updated military influence and dazzles with the season’s latest trend—goldtone accents. Crafted in a rich wool blend, the wrist tabs and epaulets are also adorned with chic goldtone button trim. Two front patch pockets and two hand-warmer pockets. Polysatin lining. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Fabulous Faux Shearling Cape
description: ITEM: 8018Just throw on this fabulous faux shearling zippered cape over anything, and you’re good to go—in style. It looks great on any body type. With faux fur hood trim featuring pompoms for pulls. Soft and plush, it looks and feels like the real thing. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Ladies Full Length Fashion Coat
description: ITEM: 7022Long on looks and warmth, our luscious, soft-as-lambskin full-length coat is accented with acrylic faux fur shawl collar and cuffs. Front and back vertical stitching make for a slimming silhouette. Adjust the roll-up cuffs for a perfect fit. Decorative zigzag stitching enhances the two outside slash pockets. Quilted lining. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Genuine Mink Cape
description: ITEM: 5508Beyond fabulous is this chic, sculptured mink cape, featuring a magnificent genuine black fox trim forming a tuxedo front. Designed exclusively for us by Damselle®, this gorgeous fur will complete any dressy outfit, with its beautiful lines and rich styling. Satin lining, furrier hook closure. Fur origin: Finland. Imported. Fur clean.

name: Quilted Winter Parka
description: ITEM: 8083The winter coat of choice… starting with a classic quilted silhouette. Change its look with a cozy snap on/off faux fur collar. Or tighten the drawstring at the waist for a more fitted look. Fashion snaps, flap front pockets, zippered horizontal pockets, two snap-close chest pockets, and zipper closure. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Ladies Faux Fur 3/4 Animal Print
description: ITEM: 8087This fabulous faux fur coat comes alive with gorgeous detailing. Chic elastic smocking at the waist and sleeves for a pretty bell effect. Fashionably double breasted and very flattering on all body shapes. Fully lined. 100% polyester. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Ladies Short Animal Print Jacket
description: ITEM: 8091Flaunt your wild side in our sassy leopard-motif jacket. Its fun and versatile cropped length is ideal for pants and skirts and looks great day and night. Hidden snap closures. Fully lined. 100% polyester. Imported.

description: ITEM: 8085Admired for its gorgeous fur, the leopard is interpreted into this standout piece that will liven up any outfit. Modernizing the look of the vest is a graceful zippered front, attractive collar, and dramatic faux leather tie belt. Polysatin lining. Imported.

name: Faux Shearling Cape
description: ITEM: 8066Indulge your inner diva and dress up any outfit in our faux shearling cape with gorgeous faux silver fox trim. Features a sueded outer shell, fully lined with acrylic pile fur. name: Faux Wool Hooded Jacket
description: ITEM: 8078Fashioned in a cropped, silhouette with the addition of the hood and rich detail stitching makes this jacket versatile and special. Two side slash pockets. Made in a perfect weight poly plush with light polyfill. Imported. Dry clean.

description: ITEM: 6144There is nothing more versatile than a well-cut blazer. Yes, one that’s made of soft lambskin. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Short Quilted Moto Jacket
description: ITEM: 5042Our model of this year’s fashion editor’s favorite is made of lustrous, top quality lambskin leather, featuring an asymmetrical design with quilted trim on the shoulders, side panels, and sleeves. Standup collar, racy zipper detailing on pockets and sleeves, a snap front placket, and adjustable buckles on the side make this jacket extraordinary. Poly twill lining. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Short Banded Collar Jacket
description: ITEM: 5052Soft and elegant with a touch of distress, this jacket feels as unique as it looks. Runway trends include motorcycle design, beautifully crafted ribbing on the shoulders, snap tab collar, princess seaming, metal zipper treatment on the front pockets and sleeves, and adjustable buckle belt. Poly satin lining. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Ladies Double Breasted Pea Coat
description: ITEM: 8005At the top of every well-dressed woman’s outerwear punch list, this peacoat is beyond an exceptional value. name: Ladies Lamb Wrap Jacket
description: ITEM: 6143In a timeless silhouette, the graceful wrap jacket subtly shapes your waist in a most feminine, flattering way. This model features superb workmanship and rich detail stitching on the collar and belt, plus chic epaulettes. Back flange for easy movement. Zippered front with a three snap placket closure. Two side slash pockets. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Hooded Cinched Waist Quilted Jacket
description: ITEM: 8058This trendy jacket is big on style. From its exaggerated, gathered shirred hood that folds down to a dramatic collar, to its zippers, snaps, slimming elasticized waist for shape, it’s chic and cozy all in one. Polyester with polyfill lining, knit cuffs. Imported. Machine washable.

description: ITEM: 6031This easy, modern pencil coat of smooth nappa leather is the epitome of sleek: skimming, slimming, elegant. Wear it dressy with a skirt or more casual with jeans. Fashioned with a concealed three-button front closure, two side slash pockets. Polysatin quilted lining. Imported. Leather clean.

name: The Mixed Media Skirt
description: ITEM: 4604In a combination of soft and supple lambskin leather and ponti stretch fabric, we've created the perfect fitting skirt. the pleated fabric front and back will form to your body to assure a perfect fit. fully lined with stretch fabric for easy movement. Black pleat, back zip. 21 inch

name: The Mixed Media Pant
description: ITEM: 4605For the perfect fitting pant, you'll love our combination of lambskin leather and ponti stretch fabric. Front leather and back stretch material with leather accents on back pocket. lined to the knee. Front up and button closure. 29 3/4 inch  Inseam.

name: The Mixed Media Dress
description: ITEM: 4606Our newest signature piece in a combination of luxurious lambskin leather and ponti stretch fabric is a perfect addition to your wardrobe. The stretch fabric, including the lining, assures a comfortable and awesome fit. Zip back. 36 inch  Backlength.

name: Look fabulous and stay warm!
description: ITEM: 8051Our newest wool blend double breasted jacket features outstanding black enamel and gold tone buttons, detailed even on the strap cuff.  Warm polyfil with designer quality animal print lining, two front patch pockets, and a luxurious faux fur collar makes this jacket one of our most popular styles this season. Imported.

The combination of wool and acrylic with a polyfil filler is the perfect jacket weight for this fall and winter. The double breasted silver hardware, which includes button accents on the back self belt, as well as the convenient zipper pockets are strikingly attractive. Imported.

name: Ladies 3 Button Leather Blazer
description: ITEM: 6681For wearability and versatility, this classic blazer in supple nappa leather reigns supreme. Great with pants or skirts, night or day. Easy three-button styling with two outside flap pockets. Poly satin lining. Imported.

name: Ladies DB Wool Coat
description: ITEM: 8029This double-breasted wool blend classic features chic accents including ten brass tone buttons. name: Ladies Wool Hooded Jacket
description: ITEM: 8034Everything about this coat looks just right. And so will you. With a relaxed hood trimmed in faux coyote that buttons off for added versatility. name: Double breasted peacoat and more…
description: ITEM: 8054We took our basic double breasted wool blend peacoat, added ornamental gold and black buttons, four front zippers (two on the top are decorative, two on the bottom fully functional), and then added faux leather trim on the pockets and on the shoulders, front and back. Simply put, we transformed a basic into an updated, versatile, modern hip style that looks great on everyone! Imported.

name: The Toggle Coat

We love the details which include diagonal stitching on the leather look trim, both on the shoulders and on the sleeves. Other features include a detachable hood, two large lower patch pockets, a hidden zipper, snap placket, and toggle closure. This is a lot of coat at a great price!  Imported.

name: The Modern Trench Coat
description: ITEM: 8062Look pretty and stylish in this great 35” belted poly plush trench coat. Black and silver buttons, silver zipper pockets, silver eyelets and a stunning silver belt buckle add to the mix. Poly fill lining for extra warmth. Imported.

name: Faux Shearling Go-To Jacket
description: ITEM: 8063This is the perfect jacket to throw on when you’re looking for something to keep you warm. It is casual and smart looking. Imported.

name: Ladies Peacoat
description: ITEM: 8036Elevated from the everyday with its fashionable silvertone button front, this jacket is versatile enough to go with casual daywear yet perfect for a night out. Dry clean.

name: Ladies Genuine Rabbit Fur Vest
description: ITEM: 5509This superfun, supersoft genuine rabbit fur vest adds instant flair to even the most basic looks. Throw it on for the movies, or a dressy night out. Features three furrier hook closures. Elegantly lined in polysatin. Imported. Fur clean.

name: Ladies Genuine Mink 3/4 Coat
description: ITEM: 5304Make a lasting impression in this timeless, sumptuous sculpted mink masterpiece with a genuine fox tuxedo front. Furrier hook and ring closures. Imported. Fur origin: Finland. Fur clean.

name: Faux Collar Wrap Coat

This model features a self-belt, removable fauxfur collar, and two outside slash pockets. Warm poly plush, light polyfill with polysatin lining. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Lambskin Leather Scuba Jacket
description: ITEM: 5024Zip through the seasons in our tailored, soft as lambskin leather scuba jacket. Featuring a fitted zip front, two zippered on seam front pockets. Quilted poly lining. Imported. Leather clean.

name: Faux Shearling Coat
description: ITEM: 8055Our faux shearling statement coat lends an elegant sheen to whatever you’re wearing. Easy and effortless three-button styling with optional self-tie belt. Soft acrylic pile lining, acrylic fur collar and cuffs. Outside seam detail, two side pockets. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Asymmetrical Faux Shearling Coat
description: ITEM: 8071A longer generous 34” length keeps you that much warmer during the winter months. name: Quilted Full Length Coat
description: ITEM: 8093We’ve brought back our 48” classic quilted silhouette because so many of our customers asked  for it. Lined with warm poly fill and knit storm cuffs for extra protection. With hidden on seam zipper pockets.  It’s a must-have winter necessity! Imported.

name: Lightweight and Packable Jacket!
description: ITEM: 8094We call this our Packable Polyfill. Lightweight and warm, this jacket folds up and fits into its own matching storage bag. What a great travel jacket! Concealed hood and on seam pockets for even more versatility. Imported.

name: Lambskin Leather Moto Jacket
description: ITEM: 8095Our newest and updated motorcycle inspired jacket is a fabulous addition to your wardrobe this season. name: Faux Mink Vest
description: ITEM: 8057It’s definitely the year of the vest, and this awesome, figure-flattering version is long and lovely with youthful feminine ruffles and a belt to cinch in the waist. description: ITEM: 9384Positively twice the fun—and twice the look! Cool calf-height boots of soft suede with an inside zip for easy fit, top-back lace tie for adjustment to calf. Thin rubber sole. name: Ladies Scooter Style Lambskin Leather Jacket
description: ITEM: 1660One of this year’s must-haves, for both men and women, is the scooter jacket. Crafted of a rugged nappa leather, superior quality throughout. name: Belted Lambskin Leather Jacket
description: ITEM: 8096A perfect 29” back length motorcycle inspired jacket with an asymmetrical front zip makes a fashion statement for this season. Imported.

name: Lambskin Leather Scuba Jacket
description: ITEM: 8098One of our most popular styles, this year’s version is made in buttery soft top quality lambskin leather. Women love this jacket for its clean lines, princess seaming, and poly quilted lining. 26” back length.

name: Leather and Stretch Knit Jacket for a fabulous fit!
description: ITEM: 8099Made of soft and supple lambskin leather with an overall diamond quilted design and stretch sides make this popular jacket a great fit. Form fitting and flattering on almost everyone. Matching stretch knit collar, silver hardware, and poly quilted lining. Imported.

description: ITEM: 8105Combine luxurious soft lambskin leather with contrasting lambsuede trim and you’ve got a winner!  Lambsuede trims the shoulder, front zip, and jacket bottom. Two front zip pockets and zippers on the sleeve for extra detail. Poly fill lining. 22” back length. Imported.

name: Quilted Scoop Neck Lambskin Leather Jacket
description: ITEM: 8106You will feel special when you wear this luxurious lambskin leather diamond quilted jacket. Banded scoop neckline, leather covered stretch elastic, snap cuffs and polyquilted lining just to mention a few of this jacket’s meticulous details. Imported.

name: Lambskin Leather Dress
description: ITEM: 0543Make this your signature piece for all seasons. name: Lambskin Leather Jacket

name: Quilted Hooded Jacket
description: ITEM: 8088Transition into the new season with our lightweight short jacket featuring a diamond quilted silhouette and hood. Conveniently water resistant. With two zipper side pockets and two inside pockets. Polyfill lining for extra warmth. Imported. Dry clean.

description: ITEM: 8059The perfect three-season outerwear staple in a versatile knee length. Topped with a practical zip-off hood. Knit cuffs keep out the cold. With two outside pockets, two inside pockets. Water resistant with polyfill lining. Imported. Dry clean.

name: Lambskin Leather Four Button Coat
description: ITEM: 8107Look and feel fabulous in this stunning 34” buttery soft lambskin leather coat. Details include a button down collar, button tab cuffs, back belt, and inverted back pleat lined in wool. Poly quilted lining. A very current and fashionable statement. Imported.

name: Lambskin Leather Straight Bottom Jacket
description: ITEM: 8108Always a favorite, we’ve reinvented our basic lambskin leather straight bottom jacket in a longer 28” length. Standup collar with faux fur trim, faux fur  adjustable cuffs, two side pockets, and a warm poly quilted lining. Imported.

name: Fashionable Hooded Jacket in Lambskin Leather
description: ITEM: 8109Everyone looks great in this 32” length soft and supple lambskin jacket. Worn up or down, a faux fur fox trimmed hood adds some pizzazz to this basic favorite. Two front patch pockets, elastic sleeves, and poly satin lined with poly fill for extra warmth. Imported.
